description: Test omnivore souls: validate hunting, grazing, dietary variety bonus, and tactical adaptation

herbivores.note: Using deterministic herbivores for baseline comparison

customAgents.note: Primary test subjects - should demonstrate both hunting and grazing

primary: Omnivores demonstrate BOTH hunting and grazing behaviors
Dietary variety bonus triggers at least once per omnivore
Omnivores survive at competitive rates vs pure carnivores
Tactical switching based on threat level
secondary: Omnivores outperform pure specialists in mixed environments
Energy efficiency competitive with or better than specialists
